de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database

Class DbEmailConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database.DbObject
      • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.database.DbEmailConfiguration

  • public class DbEmailConfiguration
extends DbObject
    This class is the representation of a E-mail configuration in the database. It provides get methods to get the sender, receiver, subject and message of an e-mail.
